definition: to cut out (as a dress)/to cut/to trim/to reduce/to diminish/to cut back (e.g. on staff)/decision/judgment

sentences.english: The administration has a two-track strategy for getting New START approved.
sentences.chinese: 政府對於達成新的戰略裁軍協議做了兩手準備。

sentences.english: They should play an active role in helping nuclear-armed states disarm. There are many ways for them to collaborate
sentences.chinese: 它們應發揮積極作用，幫助有核國家裁軍。

sentences.english: The relationship between disarmament and nonproliferation remains crucial.
sentences.chinese: 裁軍與防擴散的關係仍然極其重要。
裁軍談判在維也納開始。

sentences.english: North Korea quit the aid-for-disarmament discussions in April.
sentences.chinese: 四月，朝鮮退出了以援助換取裁軍的討論。

sentences.english: The lasting we want it a trigger-happy general at the disarmament talks.
sentences.chinese: 在裁軍會談中我們最不喜歡的是好戰的將軍。

sentences.english: The disarmament conference will be reconvened next month.
sentences.chinese: 裁軍會議將於下月再次召開。

sentences.english: What is the latest state of play in the disarm ament talks?
sentences.chinese: 裁軍談判的最新情況怎麼樣？

sentences.english: The superpowers never agreed to disarm.
sentences.chinese: 超級大國絕不同意裁軍。

sentences.english: China has steadfastly attended multilateral negotiations on arms control and disarmament, and some related international conferences.
sentences.chinese: 中國積極參加多邊軍控與裁軍談判及相關國際會議。

sentences.english: In addition to non-proliferation issues, attention of the GGE should also be focused on arms control and disarmament matters.
sentences.chinese: 在關注防擴散問題的同時，也應兼顧軍控和裁軍。

sentences.english: It enraged Russia, leading it to threaten to scupper disarmament talks.
sentences.chinese: 它激怒了俄羅斯，導致發出威脅要中止裁軍談判。

sentences.english: Xu is now part of China Arms Control and Disarmament Association.
sentences.chinese: 徐光宇現在在中國軍備控制與裁軍協會。

sentences.english: What is the latest state of play in the disarmament talks?
sentences.chinese: 裁軍談判的最新情況怎麼樣？

sentences.english: It is difficult to persuade the superpowers to disarm.
sentences.chinese: 要說服超級大國裁軍是很難的。

sentences.english: But not long afterwards, six-party aid for disarmament talks began.
sentences.chinese: 但之後不久，“援助換裁軍”的六方會談正式開始。

definition: variant of 戰略伙伴|战略伙伴[zhan4 lu:e4 huo3 ban4]

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

definition: (jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
to review a judicial case/to reexamine
lit. pull one hair and the whole body moves/fig. a slight change will affect everything else/the butterfly effect
pinyin: qian1 yi1 fa4 er2 dong4 quan2 shen1
